import express from 'express';
import path from 'path';
import { fileURLToPath } from 'url';
import cors from 'cors';

// Ustawienie __dirname w ESM
const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url);
const __dirname = path.dirname(__filename);

const app = express();
const PORT = process.env.PORT || 3000;

// Middleware
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());
app.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true }));

// ObsÅ‚uga statycznych plikÃ³w (np. frontend z Vite/dist)
app.use(express.static(path.join(__dirname, 'public')));

// PrzykÅ‚adowy endpoint API
app.get('/api/ping', (req, res) => {
  res.json({ message: 'âœ… Hustler Team API dziaÅ‚a poprawnie!' });
});

// Fallback (dla SPA)
app.get('*', (req, res) => {
  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, 'public', 'index.html'));
});

// Start serwera
app.listen(PORT, () => {
  console.log(`ğŸš€ Serwer Hustler Team dziaÅ‚a na porcie ${PORT}`);
});
